        @PostMapping(value="/modifyForum",
             consumes="multipart/form-data")
public java.lang.String modifyForum(@RequestParam(value="content_idx")
                                                                                                                      int content_idx,
                                                                                                                      @RequestParam(value="board_code")
                                                                                                                      int board_code,

                                                                                                                      java.lang.String title,
                                                                                                                      @RequestParam(value="appids",required=false,defaultValue="0")
                                                                                                                      int appids,
                                                                                                                      @RequestParam(value="member_id")
                                                                                                                      java.lang.String member_id,
                                                                                                                      @RequestParam(value="content")
                                                                                                                      java.lang.String content,
                                                                                                                      @RequestParam(value="image",required=false)
                                                                                                                      org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile image)
        API_0017 게시물 수정 http://localhost:8080/GameForum/modifyForum
        Parameters:

        image - 새로 업로드할 이미지
        Returns:
        { "header":{ "msg":"OK", "code":"00" }, "body":{ "result":1 } }
